page.title: 08Hospitals in Frome
page.content: There are 3 in Frome:- {Victoria:}General medical,surgical and obstetric cases & maternity ward. {Selwood:}Care of the mentally handi- capped. It is planned to close it soon and disperse the patients to sheltered homes. {St.Aldhelms:}Care of the old & chroni- cally sick. In Frome they have recently build a day centre at St.Aldhelms hospital the money raised was Â£32,500 it was raised by different organisations in Frome & some was donated.It took 18 Months & should be finised at the end of August. {Frome Opportunity Playgroup}- for pre- school children who are mentally, physically or socially handicapped. {Gateway Club:}for mentally handicapped There is a Health Centre for l5 doctors & 2o nurses. Sarah Nowell
